div.p:
Nutrition Services Department will be packing sack breakfasts and lunches and will distribute in the parking lots of Ute Pass Elementary School and Manitou Springs High School.
These meals can be picked up daily from 11:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.

a.span: Information for new and returning students
Over 600 students choose MSSD14 each year!
MSSD14, The right place to work!

div.br: The lights at Richardson Field will shine every Monday from 9:00-9:15 PM as a symbol of hope and love for our Mustang students, families, and community. Know that there is light at the end of all of this. Stay positive and let your light shine bright until we can be together again. We miss you!
